#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
    int n;
	 cin>>n;
	 int a[n];
	 for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	 {
	 	 cin>>a[i];
	 }
	 sort(a,a+n);
	 int k=2,l=0,r=n-1;
	 for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	 {
	   if(k%2==0)
	   {
	      cout<<a[r]<<" ";	
	      r--;
	   }
	   else
	   {
	   	   cout<<a[l]<<" ";
	      l++;
	    
	   }
	    k++;
	 }
	 cout<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
